sources.title: The Redemption of Henry Myers (WESTERN FILM in German complete, Western action film full movie)

metadata.Plot: Henry Myers lives a hard life. After his latest heist goes wrong and his partners betray him and leave him for dead, Henry is surprised to find extraordinary kindness from a widow and her children. Soon he begins to question the choices he's made in his life. Just as things begin to make sense again, they take an interesting turn.
metadata.Writer: Clayton Miller, Charlie Shahnaian, Chris VanderKaay
metadata.Actors: Drew Waters, Erin Bethea, Jaden Roberts
